description: This is the first base ability. It gives player damage resistance for a specified period of time. You can have multiple abilities inheriting from this with different options and names.

particle.description: Specifies the type of the particle which is used to form a circle around the player.

particleFrequency.description: Specifies the "frequency" of the particles. The "frequency" is used to determine the step angle, which is 180 divided by the "frequency". The higher the number is, the further apart will the particles be.

radius.description: Specifies the radius of the circle formed around the player.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of the shield in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).

disableAttack.description: Specifies whether the player should be prevented from attacking other entities while the shield is active.
